respStmt.name: Jen-jou Hung 洪振洲, Jhih-Sian Lee 李志賢

publicationStmt.publisher: Dharma Drum Buddhist College 法鼓佛教學院
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Jinshan, Taiwan 台灣新北市金山區

availability.p: This electronic text is distributed by Dharma Drum Buddhist College under a Creative Commons Attribution Share-Alike Licence Version 3.0.

sourceDesc.p: Text Base is the CBETA edition of the Chinese Buddhist Canon (Version 2009)

profileDesc.creation: The Biqiuni zhuan is dated 516 CE

encodingDesc.p: 文本中所使用的新式標點，其主要是參考北京中華書局於2006年出版的《比丘尼傳校註》，校註者為王孺童。
The punctuation of this digital edition follows in the main the 2006 edition "Biqiuni zhuan jiaozhu 比丘尼傳校註" Beijing: Zhonghua 中華. Wang Rutong.
本數位版本是法鼓佛教學院佛教傳記文學專案的一部分http://buddhistinformatics.ddbc.edu.tw/biographies/
This digital edition is part of the Buddhist Biography Literature Project at Dharma Drum Buddhist College. http://buddhistinformatics.ddbc.edu.tw/biographies/

For a discussion of the project please refer to Bingenheimer, Marcus; Hong, Jen-Jou; Wiles, Simon 2009: “Markup meets GIS - Visualizing the ‘Biographies of Eminent Buddhist Monks’.” In: Proceedings Information Visualization IV 2009. Edited by E.Banissi et.al. Published by the IEEE Computer Society. ISBN: 978-0-7695-3733-7. pp.550-554. DOI: 10.1109/IV.2009.91 and Jen-Jou HUNG, Marcus BINGENHEIMER, Zhi-Wei XU 2010: “漢文佛典的語意標記與應用：《高僧傳》文獻的時空資訊視覺化和語意搜尋 - Semantic markup for Chinese Buddhist texts and its Application- A Platform for Querying and Spatio-temporal Visualization of the Biographies of Eminent Monks”, (國立政治大學) 圖書與資訊學刊 (National Changchi University) Journal of Librarianship and Information Studies. Vol.2, No.3 (No.74), Aug 2010, pp.1-24. Jen-Jou HUNG, Marcus BINGENHEIMER, Simon WILES 2010: “Digital Texts and GIS: The interrogation and coordinated visualization of Classical Chinese texts" Proceedings International Conference on Computer Design and Applications ICCDA 2010. ISBN: 978-1-4244-7163-8
